reviewText: This is the second DVD I bough from Class on Demand and the results are very good!. I like to learn by my self before attend to a site class, and COD gave me the tools I need to start my own projects in a simple and very structured way. I'm centrtanly a Class on Demand Follower

"Class on Demand: Basic Training for Adobe CS3 Production Premium: Adobe Educational Training Tutorial DVD includes Premiere Pro CS3" is a great starting point for those users who want to get a look at what all of the programs bundled in Adobe Creative Suite CS3 Production Premium can do. The 4.5 hours of video are well laid out and provide a good overview of the capabilities and workflow when using these Adobe programs to achieve great results. The chapters include: 1-On Location 2-Ultra (for Windows Users Only) or Keylight in After Effects (for Mac Users Only) 3-Soundbooth and PremierePro 4-Illustrator 5-Photoshop 6-After Effects 7-Encore 8-Flash The Flash chapter was a little weak and those not doing chromakey (greenscreen) might not get a ot out of chapter #2, but otherwise a strong training video! Highly recommended, especially for those new to the Adobe package!
